title: Receive Lower Priority Queue after error from client
body: After queueing up a match, during the loading screen I suddenly got kick out, which causes the client gone error and start repairing itself. Later when I logging onto the client the screen showed up with the lower priority queue notification. Please help me out ;( ....

replies.body: The client only needs to repair when it runs into missing or damaged files that the game wouldn't be able to work properly without. Since the game wouldn't have been able to run anyways, it went ahead and started the repair to try and get you back in the game as fast as it could. Have you been able to play normally after that repair or are you still having issues?
